item.title: Sabuj Jana - Personal Space on the Internet
item.description: Hello, My name is Sabuj (translates to green in Bengali). Welcome to my personal space in the vast Internet ! I work as a Software Engineer in Flipkart and love experimenting with technology, especially cloud native. I like to share my thoughts and coding experiments through tech blogs on Medium. Talk to me up about: linux, networks, systems, elb, golang, cloud, kuberentes, istio, cilium, docker, c++ etc. I live in India, currently exploring the tech-driven city of Bengaluru.
